titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Byron all the morning. Then to Sunderland again for two confirmations at Whitburn (80 candidates), and S. Mary Magdalene (47). These last I confirmed separately, one by one. In the interval I had an interview with Dr Morison, & called on Wynne–Willson. We got back to the Castle about 10 p.m.
